title: unspecified error occurred.Please check the logs for more information.
body: I install patch 6.21 I play a game I close lol and I open it again the other day and it says unspecified error occurred.Please check the logs for more information.what can I do?(sorry for my bad english I m from Greece)

replies.body:
Thanks for your awesome supporting ! The league of legends client started working again !   Amazing ! Keep that great work(I just re-
 patch force)

I install hextech repair tool should I reinstall lol?
 ( I m not so good with computers though :D)

when I press retry the patch from 0% 
 go to 33% and then the error pop out again

This is perfect, thanks for that!  At 33% your patcher has finished scanning files, and is ready to connect to our patching server to download updates.  Unfortunately, it looks like something is blocking that connection from happening.  Go over the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this resolved.  Let me know if you have any questions!
I install hextech repair tool should I try reinstall lol?(I m not so good with computers thought :D)
It sounds like the patcher is wanting to apply an update, but something is getting in the way. At what % during the patcher is this happening?  Let me know, and I'd be happy to help!

I dont know what to do I search to youtube to find how to fix this problem but the latest I find is at patch
 5.16
it doesnt work I just finish updating the patch and it pops the same messege again what should I do?(plz help)
